name: Gladiator (itch) (Ohmless)
description:
You are Galactic Federation Gladiator unit #431731257 investigating a distress signal in your patrol area. Don't let anything stand in the way of your duty!

Gladiator is a tactical shoot-em-up. You will need to not only fire blasts to destroy threats but raise shields to defend yourself.

Main Credits:

Programming/Concept: Matt Jackson

Art/Animation: Sean Snell

Note: development is halted indefinitely until necessary funds or donated assets are acquired.
